ElementDescription: The NDAR Global Unique Identifier (GUID) for research subject
Subject ID how it's defined in lab/project
Age in months at the time of the interview/test/sampling/imaging.
Notes: Age is rounded to chronological month. If the research participant is 15-days-old at time of interview, the appropriate value would be 0 months. If the participant is 16-days-old, the value would be 1 month.

ElementDescription: Date on which the interview/genetic test/sampling/imaging/biospecimen was completed. MM/DD/YYYY
Sex of subject at birth
Notes: M = Male; F = Female; O=Other; NR = Not reported

ElementDescription: Form used/assessment name
Notes: e.g., Self-Report, Parent Form, Short Form, Revised Version

ElementDescription: Over the last 4 weeks, how often have you been bothered by feeling nervous, anxious or on edge?
Notes: 0 = Not at all; 1 = Several days; 2 = More than half the days; 3 = Nearly every day; 999 = Missing

ElementDescription: Over the last 4 weeks, how often have you been bothered by not being able to stop or control worrying?
Notes: Decimals: answered between two values - 0 = Not at all; 1 = Several days; 2 = More than half the days; 3 = Nearly every day; 999 = Missing

ElementDescription: Over the last 4 weeks, how often have you been bothered by worrying too much about different things?
Notes: 0 = Not at all; 1 = Several days; 2 = More than half the days; 3 = Nearly every day; 999 = Missing

ElementDescription: Over the last 4 weeks, how often have you been bothered by trouble relaxing?
Notes: 0 = Not at all; 1 = Several days; 2 = More than half the days; 3 = Nearly every day; 999 = Missing

ElementDescription: Over the last 4 weeks, how often have you been bothered by being so restless that it is hard to sit still?
Notes: 0 = Not at all; 1 = Several days; 2 = More than half the days; 3 = Nearly every day; 999 = Missing

ElementDescription: Over the last 4 weeks, how often have you been bothered by becoming easily annoyed or irritable?
Notes: 0 = Not at all; 1 = Several days; 2 = More than half the days; 3 = Nearly every day; 999 = Missing

ElementDescription: Over the last 4 weeks, how often have you been bothered by feeling afraid as if something awful might happen?
Notes: 0 = Not at all; 1 = Several days; 2 = More than half the days; 3 = Nearly every day; 999 = Missing

ElementDescription: GAD-2 score
Notes: 0-2=None; 3-6=Probable Anxiety Disorder

ElementDescription: GAD-7 total score
Notes: Decimals: answered between two values - 5=Mild Anxiety; 10-Moderate Anxiety; 15=Severe Anxiety; >=10 - Probable diagnosis of GAD, confirm by further evaluation; 999 = Missing

ElementDescription: GAD-7 Subjective Rating of Impairment: If you checked off any problems, how difficult have these problems made it for you to do your work, take care of things at home, or get along with other people?
Notes: 0 = Not difficult at all; 1 = Somewhat difficult; 2 = Very difficult; 3 = Extremely difficult; 999 = Missing

ElementDescription: When did the GAD symptoms begin?
Visit name
Notes: e.g., Baseline, 6-Month Follow Up, Year 2, Daily

ElementDescription: Over the last 2 weeks, how often have you been bothered by feeling nervous, anxious or on edge?
Notes: 0 = Not at all; 1 = Several days; 2 = More than half the days; 3 = Nearly every day; 999 = Missing

ElementDescription: Over the last 2 weeks, how often have you been bothered by not being able to stop or control worrying?
Notes: 0 = Not at all; 1 = Several days; 2 = More than half the days; 3 = Nearly every day; 999 = Missing

ElementDescription: Over the last 2 weeks, how often have you been bothered by worrying too much about different things?
Notes: 0 = Not at all; 1 = Several days; 2 = More than half the days; 3 = Nearly every day; 999 = Missing

ElementDescription: Over the last 2 weeks, how often have you been bothered by trouble relaxing?
Notes: 0 = Not at all; 1 = Several days; 2 = More than half the days; 3 = Nearly every day; 999 = Missing

ElementDescription: Over the last 2 weeks, how often have you been bothered by being so restless that it is hard to sit still?
Notes: 0 = Not at all; 1 = Several days; 2 = More than half the days; 3 = Nearly every day; 999 = Missing

ElementDescription: Over the last 2 weeks, how often have you been bothered by becoming easily annoyed or irritable?
Notes: 0 = Not at all; 1 = Several days; 2 = More than half the days; 3 = Nearly every day; 999 = Missing

ElementDescription: Over the last 2 weeks, how often have you been bothered by feeling afraid as if something awful might happen?
Notes: 0 = Not at all; 1 = Several days; 2 = More than half the days; 3 = Nearly every day; 999 = Missing

ElementDescription: Site
Notes: Study Site

ElementDescription: The number of milliseconds since the start of the questionnaire until completed
The number of milliseconds since the start of the experiment until the questionnaire was completed
Month of the interview
Notes: 0=Baseline; 1=Month 1; 2=Month 2; 3=Month 3; 4= Month 4; 5= Month 5; 6=Month 6

ElementDescription: Respondent
Notes: NA=Not Applicable

ElementDescription: Timepoint/visit label
Notes: e.g., Baseline, 6-Month Follow Up, Year 2; Morning, At Bedtime

ElementDescription: Week administered
Numeric Visit Number
Notes: -1.5 = Pre-Screening; -1 = Screening; 0 = Baseline; ## = Visit ## (from 1 to 10); Whole numbers = standard monthly visits; #.001 - #.009 = Unscheduled; #.1 = End of Phase 1; #.2 = End of Phase 2; #.3 = End of Phase 3; #.4 = End of Open Choice Phase; #.5 = End of Study; #.6 = Genetic Analysis; 1000=all visits

ElementDescription: Over the last 24 hours, how often have you been bothered by feeling nervous, anxious, or on edge?
Notes: 0 = Not at all; 1 = Some of the time; 2 = Most of the time; 3 = Nearly all of the time; 999 = Missing

ElementDescription: Over the last 24 hours, how often have you been bothered by not being able to stop or control worrying?
Notes: 0 = Not at all; 1 = Some of the time; 2 = Most of the time; 3 = Nearly all of the time; 999 = Missing

ElementDescription: Over the last 24 hours, how often have you been bothered by worrying too much about different things?
Notes: 0 = Not at all; 1 = Some of the time; 2 = Most of the time; 3 = Nearly all of the time; 999 = Missing

Notes: 0 = Not at all; 1 = Some of the time; 2 = Most of the time; 3 = Nearly all of the time; 999 = Missing

ElementDescription: Over the last 24 hours, how often have you been bothered by being so restless that it is hard to sit still?
Notes: 0 = Not at all; 1 = Some of the time; 2 = Most of the time; 3 = Nearly all of the time; 999 = Missing

ElementDescription: Over the last 24 hours, how often have you been bothered by becoming easily annoyed or irritable?
Notes: 0 = Not at all; 1 = Some of the time; 2 = Most of the time; 3 = Nearly all of the time; 999 = Missing

ElementDescription: Over the last 24 hours, how often have you been bothered by feeling afraid as if something awful might happen?
Notes: 0 = Not at all; 1 = Some of the time; 2 = Most of the time; 3 = Nearly all of the time; 999 = Missing

ElementDescription: Study; The code for each individual study
Notes: e.g., the name of the study in multi-grant collections

ElementDescription: If you have had any of these problems in your lifetime, how difficult have they made it for you to do your work, take care of things at home, or get along with people?
Notes: 0= Not difficult at all; 1= Somewhat difficult; 2= Very difficult; 3= Extremely difficult

ElementDescription: If you have had any of these problems over the last two weeks, how difficult have they made it for you to do your work, take care of things at home, or get along with other people?
Notes: 0= Not difficult at all; 1= Somewhat difficult; 2= Very difficult; 3= Extremely difficult

ElementDescription: GAD-7 Score (Current)
Notes: Sum of seven GAD-7 current items

ElementDescription: GAD-7 Score (Lifetime)
Notes: Sum of seven GAD-7 lifetime items

ElementDescription: In your lifetime, how often have you been bothered by feeling nervous, anxious, or on edge?
Notes: 0= Not at all; 1= Several days; 2= More than half of the days; 3= Nearly every day

ElementDescription: In your lifetime, how often have you been bothered by not being able to stop or control worrying?
Notes: 0= Not at all; 1= Several days; 2= More than half of the days; 3= Nearly every day

ElementDescription: In your lifetime, how often have you been bothered by worrying too much about different things?
Notes: 0= Not at all; 1= Several days; 2= More than half of the days; 3= Nearly every day

ElementDescription: In your lifetime, how often have you been bothered by trouble relaxing?
Notes: 0= Not at all; 1= Several days; 2= More than half of the days; 3= Nearly every day

ElementDescription: In your lifetime, how often have you been bothered by being so restless that it is hard to sit still?
Notes: 0= Not at all; 1= Several days; 2= More than half of the days; 3= Nearly every day

ElementDescription: In your lifetime, how often have you been bothered by becoming easily annoyed or irritable?
Notes: 0= Not at all; 1= Several days; 2= More than half of the days; 3= Nearly every day

ElementDescription: In your lifetime, how often have you been bothered by feeling afraid, as if something awful might happen?
Notes: 0= Not at all; 1= Several days; 2= More than half of the days; 3= Nearly every day

ElementDescription: Days since admission
Race
Notes: 1 = American Indian or Alaska Native; 2 = Asian; 3 = Black or African American; 4 = Native Hawaiian or Pacific Islander; 5 = White or Caucasian; 6 = More Than One Race; 88 = Unknown; 99 = Choose not to report
